txt.en: This heartwood was taken from one of the Wood-trolls of Eryn Singor and shines with an inner light.\n\nA woodworker in nearby Rivendell might be able to fashion something of great worth from such a valuable find.

'Where did you find this shining heartwood, [placeholder]? The Wood-trolls of Eryn Singor? It is of great quality, and from it I could fashion goods both useful and powerful!\n\n'This is the least I can do for you, friend [placeholder]. Please take this with my thanks.'
'Thank you again for the shining heartwood, [placeholder].'
'Even from the cruel Wood-trolls can come beauty, when fashioned with care.'
You have taken shining heartwood of unusually high quality from one of the Wood-trolls of Eryn Singor and should find someone who can make use of it.
Bring the shining heartwood to a woodworker in Rivendell
A woodworker in Rivendell might be able to fashion something of great worth from the shining heartwood you found.\n\nYou should bring the shining heartwood to a woodworker in Rivendell.
